line.text: Is it for fear to wet a widow eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thou consum thy self in single life
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ah if thou issueless shalt hap to die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The world will wail thee like a makeless wife
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The world will be thy widow and still weep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thou no form of thee hast left behind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When every private widow well may keep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By children eyes her husband shape in mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Look what an unthrift in the world doth spend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shifts but his place for still the world enjoys it
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But beauty waste hath in the world an end
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And kept unused the user so destroys it
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No love toward others in that bosom sits
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That on himself such murdrous shame commits
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
